credit_line: Gift of the Estate of James Hazen Hyde
title: Personification of Europe
provenance:
Estate of James Hazen Hyde
Ex-collection: Laurence Currie, Coombe Warren, Kingston Hill, Surrey (sold, London, Christie's, December 17, 1926, No. 134, for 168 pounds, the lot, with - 7A, -7C, -7D)
description: Bust-length female figure wearing a jeweled crown, heavy pearl pendant earrings and carrying a jeweled sceptre.  Her ermine mantle is caught by a string of pearls.  Her head is slightly tilted and turned to the right, her gaze directed toward the observer.
name: Drawing
